remarks: Composition of continuous functions.  A generalization of ~ cncfmpt1f to arbitrary domains.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
cncfcompt.bcn $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. ( A -cn-> C ) ) $.
cncfcompt.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C -cn-> D ) ) $.
cncfcompt $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( F ` B ) ) e. ( A -cn-> D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
